briefTitle: The TRANQUILITY 2 Trial: A Phase 3 Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease

armGroups.label: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered 7 times over two consecutive days
Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered 7 times over two consecutive days

outcomeMeasures.title: Schirmer Test Mean Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline comparison of reproxalap to vehicle for Schirmer test (0 to 35 mm). Higher scores represent greater tear production. The least squares mean (standard error) was derived from a mixed model repeated measures analysis of change from baseline, with baseline as a covariate, and time point and treatment group as factors.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Subject Eyes That Are Schirmer Test Responders
outcomeMeasures.description: Comparison of reproxalap to vehicle for number of subject eyes that are Schirmer test responders (10 millimeters or more increase from baseline). A generalized estimating equation analysis was performed with baseline as a covariate, and time point and treatment group as factors.

commonTop: General disorders and administration site conditions
